column1: White flour, white rice, and other refined grains have been stripped of their nutrients.
They can help lower cholesterol in your blood and make you feel full longer.

Be on the look out for: - Whole grain breads, cereals, and crackers - Whole wheat flour instead of white flour - Brown or wild rice instead of white rice - Whole wheat barley - Oatmeal - Other grains such as quinoa, amaranth, buckwheat, and millet
